tuv.seg: Deserted Wife's Benefit and Deserted Wife’s Allowance are two social welfare payments made to women who were deserted by their husbands
Is dhá íocaíocht iad Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe agus Liúntas Banchéile Thréigthe a íoctar le mná ar thréig a bhfear céile iad

Both of these payments were closed to new applications in January 1997, when the One-Parent Family Payment was introduced. Some women have continued to get Deserted Wife’s Benefit because they qualified for the payment before 2 January 1997 and have continued to meet the qualifying criteria

Dúnadh an dá íocaíocht seo d'iarratais nua i mí Eanáir 1997 nuair a seoladh an Íocaíocht Teaghlaigh Aontuismitheora Leanadh le híoc Sochair Bhanchéile Thréigthe agus Liúntais Bhanchéile Thréigthe le roinnt ban mar bhí siad cáilithe don íocaíocht roimh 2 Eanáir 1997 agus comhlíonann siad na critéir cháilithe go fóill
Deserted Wife's Benefit is a payment made to a woman deserted by her husband
Is íocaíocht do bhean ar thréig a fear céile í an Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe
Entitlement to the payment is based on social insurance contributions paid by the woman or her husband
Tá teidlíocht don íocaíocht bunaithe ar ranníocaíochtaí árachais shóisialaigh atá íoctha ag an mbean nó ag a fear céile

If you have transfered from Deserted Wife’s Benefit to One-Parent Family Payment to be accepted as a participant on a Community Employment Scheme, you can apply to have your entitlement to Deserted Wife's Benefit restored
Má tá go leor ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC íoctha agat (ní ag d'fhear céile) is féidir leat aistriú go Pinsean Stáit (Idirthréimse) agus 65 bliain d'aois sroichte agat
The maximum weekly rate of payment for Deserted Wife’s Benefit is higher than the maximum weekly rate of One-Parent Family Payment
Íoctar Pinsean Stáit (Aistriú) ag ráta níos airde ná an Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe
If you qualify to have your entitlement to Deserted Wife’s Benefit restored you may also be due arrears
Is féidir le mná atá ag fáil Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe aistriú go Pinsean Stáit (Ranníocach) nuair atá 66 bliain d'aois sroichte acu
Women getting Deserted Wife’s Benefit can apply for and transfer to the State Pension (Contributory) when they reach 66
Má cháilíonn tú d'athbhunú do theidlíochta don Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe tá seans ann go mbeidh riaráistí ag dul duit chomh maith

If you are currently getting a reduced rate of Deserted Wife's Benefit, but have been working, then you may qualify for a higher rate of State Pension (Contributory), based on your own PRSI contributions, when you reach 66

Is íocaíocht de réir tástála acmhainne an Liúntas Banchéile Thréigthe do mhná faoi 66 bliain d'aois, nach bhfuil leanaí cleithiúnacha acu agus ar thréig a bhfear céile iad agus nach bhfuil cáilithe don Sochar Banchéile Thréigthe
However if you do not qualify for the State Pension (Contributory) when you reach 66 you will automatically get a higher rate of Deserted Wife's Benefit (see 'Rates' below)
Aistreofar go huathoibríoch mná atá ag fáil an Liúntais Bhanchéile Thréigthe go dtí Pinsean Stáit (Neamh-Ranníocach) nuair atá 66 bliain d'aois bainte amach acu
In 2016 and before March 2017:
Rátaí do Shochar Banchéile Thréigthe í 2016 agus roimh Márta 2017
│PRSI │Rate per │Rate per week (aged 66 or │ │Contributions │week │over) │
│ÁSPC │aghaidh na │seachtaine: os cionn │ │ │seachtaine │aois 66 │
│PRSI │Rate per week (aged │Rate per week (aged 66│
│Ranníocaíochtaí│aghaidh na │seachtaine: os cionn │
│Contributions│under 66 - from 16 │or over - from 9 │
│ÁSPC │seachtaine (ó │aois 66 (ó 9 Márta) │
You may also get an increase in your payment for child dependents and extra benefits such as Living Alone Allowance and Fuel Allowance
Rátaí laghdaithe Sochair Bhanchéile Thréigthe
Any new application for Deserted Wife’s Benefit received on or after 31 August 1992 is subject to an earnings limit as well as satisfying the PRSI contribution condition
Tá seans ann freisin go bhfaighidh tú ráta laghdaithe Sochair mura bhfuil go leor ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC íoctha agat chun a bheith cáilithe don uasráta
Since May 2007, you will get one of the rates of Deserted Wife’s Benefit in the table above if your yearly income is less than €20,000
Is féidir le do thuilleamh agus gan go leor ranníocaíochtaí ÁSPC a bheith íoctha agat ag an am céanna d'íocaíocht a laghdú
It is important to note, a reduced rate of Deserted Wife's Benefit based on earnings or insufficient PRSI contributions does not apply to claims made before 31 August 1992

Tugtar faoi deara le do thoil nach mbaineann ráta laghdaithe Sochair Bhanchéile Thréigthe bunaithe ar thuilleamh nógan go leor íocaíochtaí ÁSPC a bheith íoctha agat le héilimh a cuireadh isteach roimh an 31 Lúnasa 1992
How to apply
Conas iarratas a dhéanamh

If you are getting Deserted Wife's Benefit, you may be entitled to extra benefits from the Department of Social Protection including a Living Alone Allowance and the Household Benefits Package when you turn 66
Ní féidir iarratas a chur isteach a thuilleadh ar Shochar Banchéile Thréigthe ná ar Liúntas Banchéile Thréigthe - dúnadh na híocaíochtaí seo d' iarratasóirí nua ó Eanáir 1997 i leith
